mutants.code:
def max_sum(arr, m):
    if len(arr) <= m:
        return 0
    start = 0
    end = 0
    maxSum = 0
    windowSum = 0
    while end < len(arr):
        windowSum += arr[end]
        if end - start + 1 == m:
            maxSum = max(maxSum, windowSum)
            windowSum -= arr[start]
            start += 1
        end += 1
    return maxSum

    if len(arr) >= m:

            maxSum = max(maxSum, windowSum)
            windowSum -= arr[start]
            start += 1
        end += 1
    return maxSum
